title: Laura's Secret
description: Laura, once destined to be a famous singer, now waitresses tables at a diner. Shaken when a surprise text from her former best friend turns things upside down, she tries to avoid a reunion that is more complicated than anyone could understand. Blaine, a professional football star, drags himself away from his latest fling to head home for his sister’s wedding. Little did he know, it was a trip that would alter his future…forever. Will Laura sacrifice her own happiness to protect the secret she has held so long? Will Blaine be able to return to life on the gridiron after his past is revealed?  2 BONUS BOOKS INCLUDED !
author: Cara Sanibel
